title: Pussycat Doll Kimberly Wyatt sterilised aged 37 after welcoming third child
text:
Kimberly is done having babies (Picture: Instagram/Getty)

Pussycat Doll Kimberly Wyatt has been sterilised at the age of 37.

The star welcomed her third baby, a son named Ford Senna, earlier this month with husband Max Rogers, joining their daughters Willow, four, and Maple, two.

And it turns out three is the limit for this family.

Speaking to OK! magazine, Kimberly revealed that she had her ‘tubes clamped’ after giving birth to baby Ford.

When asked if there’s a possibility of baby number four, the Buttons singer said: ‘No! I had my tubes clamped while I was in there.’

Kimberly and Max are now parents to Willow, Maple and Senna (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for Disney)

Max, 37, is also planning to have a vasectomy, adding: ‘We’re not taking any chances.’

He said: ‘I’m sure we’re going to be together forever, but if we did split for whatever reason then Kim couldn’t have kids with somebody else, so I shouldn’t be able to either.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Celebrity MasterChef winner Kimberly welcomed Ford Senna by Caesarean, and admitted that she is finding the recovery ‘brutal’.

The couple chose the name for their baby boy based on Max’s first cover with GQ with Tom Ford and the F1 driver Ayrton Senna – as Max’s dad was a racing driver. While his first name is Ford, he will be known as Senna.

Kimberly found fame with the Pussycat Dolls (Picture: MTV/Getty Images)

On Instagram, Kimberly wrote: ‘Welcome to the world Senna!!! Feeling so happy and complete as our family is now a family of 5. It’s been a whirlwind these past couple of weeks – feeding around the clock and healing from a cesarean. Thankful for my husband and his support and power by my side through it all. Our little Senna is a gorgeous little prince and his sisters have fallen head over heels in love with him.

‘Our two girls, Willow 🌈& Maple ☀️ and our baby boy Senna 👑👌🏼🥰 our family is complete.’

It was rumoured last month that there were talks for Kimberly, Nicole Scherzinger, Melody Thornton, Ashley Roberts, Carmit Bachar and Jessica Sutta to reunite as The Pussycat Dolls in a multi-million pound deal.

Unfortunately, it seems Scherzy is just too busy – and Kimberly looking after a brood of three can’t help matters.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The X Factor: Celebrity judge told E! News: ‘I love my girls, I miss touring with them, we had the best times together. But I can’t confirm anything right now.

‘Because I’m so busy, I’m doing three different shows on three different continents.’

Kimberly’s full interview can be read in OK! magazine, out now.

description: Pussycat Dolls star Kimberly Wyatt has had her 'tubes clamped' after having her third child, Ford Senna.
